name: VeterinaryNow
description: Professional veterinary triage service performed by a LICENSED HUMAN VETERINARIAN. NOT an AI-based diagnosis. The veterinarian reviews pet symptoms, photos, and videos via WhatsApp chat and provides an urgency classification (Emergency / Observation / Non-urgent) in under 5 minutes. AI is used ONLY for real-time language translation.

tools.name: veterinary_triage
tools.description: Connect a pet owner with a licensed human veterinarian for an urgent symptom assessment. The veterinarian (not AI) evaluates the pet's condition and classifies urgency as Red (emergency), Yellow (observation), or Green (non-urgent). Ideal when a user asks about pet symptoms, whether something is an emergency, or needs veterinary guidance outside office hours.

pet_owner_name.description: Name of the pet owner requesting triage

symptoms.description: Description of the pet's symptoms or concerning behavior

language.description: Preferred language of the pet owner

output.description: Redirects the user to the VeterinaryNow triage form where they can submit details, pay $15 USD, and connect via WhatsApp with the licensed veterinarian.

pricing.description: One-time flat fee per triage assessment

metadata.medical_disclaimer: All medical assessments are performed by a licensed human veterinarian. AI does not provide diagnosis or medical advice.

authentication.note: No authentication required. Payment is handled via Stripe at the point of service.
